short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A redirector extension based on Angular proxy files. Redirects requests based on user-defined configurations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The configurations structure is based on Angular files.

Features:
- Redirect requests based on rules.
- Set custom headers.
- Smart reload on cookies change.
- Rewrite path based on patterns.

UI is still in development...
Also much more features are coming!
